import { React, useState } from 'react' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link, useRouteMatch, useParams, } from "react-router-dom"; const WatchList = ({oneItem, setOneItem}) => { return ( <>
{oneItem.img == undefined ? '' : oneItem.img.map(e=> )}

{oneItem.title}

{oneItem.type}
{oneItem.price}
) } export default WatchList
